</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is a slender length of ice-blue glass.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47). The ground within the spell's area is swathed in deep snow, becoming difficult terrain for 1 minute.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _cone of cold_ of the appropriate level.
